attributes.action: The British Broadcasting Corporation made to disclose salaries of all broadcasters and presenters and comply fully with the Freedom of Information act
attributes.additional_details: The British Broadcasting Corporation...The BBC's Top On-Screen and Radio Stars Salaries...Should Be Publicly Identified.

rejection.details: This is for the BBC to decide upon, not the Government through legislation.  However, every organisation of its sort has to comply with FoI regulations.
